t: 11 Picks from New Amazon Furniture Lines: Stone & Beam and Rivet | Architectural Digest
s: November 8, 2017 - If you've been holding out on ordering furniture online, you've got even less of an excuse now that Amazon has announced two new in-house decor brands: Stone & Beam, with its industrial-inspired "modern farmhouse" pieces, and Rivet for those who prefer a midcentury look.
